remarks:
Membership in a Cartesian product.  Uses fewer axioms than ~ elxp . (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.) 

---

 Membership in a cross product.  Uses fewer axioms than ~ elxp . (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
statement:
elxpi $p |- ( A e. ( B X. C ) -> E. x E. y ( A = <. x , y >. /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. C ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
